# Boots of Elvenkind
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** feet

**Price** 2,500 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

These soft boots enable the wearer to move nimbly about in virtually any surroundings, granting a +5 competence bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], creator must be an elf

**Cost** 1,250 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 503
